name: Lost Diver
description:
HTML BUG: At the end, the screen goes dark. We will fix this as soon as the bullethell game jam is over. Play the downloadable version to by pass this bug!

Refresh Browser: If the controls are not working please refresh the browser and try again. Thanks

Dodge jellyfish, cannons, and harpoons as you struggle to survive with limited oxygen!

Can you reach the top and get out of the ocean's deep-depths?
